Text: God, for those who seek You with diligence, You have prepared good things just beyond sight. Pour into our hearts fervor for Your love. [t] May we love You in all, and over all. [*] That finally, we will reach the inheritance You promised for us, that surpasses every known desire. Through Jesus Christ.
Changes: 2023-09-02 - Paul Prins: Fixed casing on divine pronouns.
